title: Updated Sunny 1 Bed in Watertown Sq- 1 Deeded Garage Parking Included
posting_body: Located in the heart of Watertown Square, this gorgeous, sunny 1-bedroom apartment unit in a professional building features a kitchen with stainless steel appliances, disposal, (kitchen is currently being remodeled and will be BRAND NEW upon move in with white cabinets and granite countertops, and walls in kitchen repainted),  hardwood floors throughout unit, new bathroom with granite sink, new stackable washer/dryer in unit, central air and heat, ample closet space, and small porch/deck with new slider.
High ceilings, ceiling fan in bedroom, and new Levolor blinds.
Game room on first floor of building.
Unit also features small storage area, bike storage and one deeded garage parking spot with garage door opener.
First, last and security; tenant only pays electricity (and cable if desired).

Unit is close to all major routes (Storrow Drive, Mass Pike, 128/95, Route 2, Route 20) and major bus routes - 70 bus stop is in front of building, 2 minute walk to 71, 504, 502 (both express buses to downtown Boston and Copley), 52, 57 (to Brighton and Kenmore) and 71 to Harvard Square.
